articles.description: Teenage Roosters prodigy Joseph Suaalii has been picked in NSW’s Emerging Origin squad despite not yet being old enough to legally play in the NRL.
articles.content:
The 17-year-old is one of 29 players named on Friday who will congregate at the NSWRL Centre of Excellence in Sydney on Saturday and be addressed by Blues coach Brad Fittler.
